results.title: Mr Money
results.creator_credit: Shevard Goldstein, Karen Lund, Film Communications and M T I Teleprograms
results.brief_description: An amusing look at automation in banking. “Mr Money” is a talking automatic telling machine with quite a personality - giving each customer what he considers they deserve.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Shevard Goldstein, Karen Lund, Film Communications and M T I Teleprograms

results.title: Mr Marsh comes to school
results.creator_credit: John Krish, Leon Clore, Central Office of Information and Basic Films
results.brief_description: A youth employment officer turns up suddenly at school to confront a number of children with the various problems they are likely to encounter as they embark on a career. Reconstructs some real and imaginary situations likely to help or hinder the school leaver at the vital time of transition from school to adult life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Krish, Leon Clore, Central Office of Information and Basic Films

results.title: Mr Magoo
results.creator_credit: Stanley Tong, Ben Myron and Walt Disney Pictures
results.brief_description: Mr. Magoo becomes the target of a notorious and ruthless band of international jewel thieves when he sets out to retrieve a stolen gem. Features: Leslie Nielsen, Kelly Lynch, and Malcolm McDowell.

results.title: Mr Koumal invents a robot
results.brief_description: Mr Koumal envisions a simple mechanical device to shine his shoes for him. But the more he works on it, the more complex it becomes, until he eventually creates a huge robot which becomes master instead of servant and forces Mr Koumal to shine its shoes.
results.description: Mr Koumal envisions a simple mechanical device to shine his shoes for him. But the more he works on it, the more complex it becomes, until he eventually creates a huge robot which becomes master instead of servant and forces Mr Koumal to shine its shoes.

results.title: Mr Koumal flies like a bird
results.creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Studio Animovaneho Filmu and Sim Productions
results.brief_description: Mr Koumal has his heart set on flying like a bird. His repeated attempts end in disaster. Ultimately the irrepressible Mr Koumal finds a way out. He sells the feathers he has used for wings to an Indian head-dress shop.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gene Deitch, Studio Animovaneho Filmu and Sim Productions

results.title: Mr Koumal carries the torch. Mr Koumal invents a robot. Mr Koumal flies like a bird
results.creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Studio Animovaneho Filmu and Sim Productions
results.brief_description: This series of three vignettes illustrates the ironies of life and universal human foibles. Mr Koumal is Everyman at his optimistic best.

results.title: Mr Koumal carries the torch
results.creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Studio Animovaneho Filmu and Sim Productions
results.brief_description: Mr Koumal is determined to carry a torch to its destination. He runs on and on, braving many obstacles; nothing can deter him from pursuing his task. Just when he comes within a few steps of the finishing line, a bystander trips him up, crosses the line with the torch, and wins all the glory. Animated film. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gene Deitch, Studio Animovaneho Filmu and Sim Productions
